TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Lamuan, title = Lamuan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lamuan} }

S.FORM: alang Lamuan ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Zosi go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 34 buwan, 146 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 99% kyan ku 144 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 1% kyan ku 2 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 88%, Amis 1%, Paywan 1%, Cou 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 8%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Lamuan hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Lamuan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Lamuan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Lamuan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Lamuan hya' ga Panital. tay mkyahu' na Lamuan hya' ga Taluk. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Lamuan ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Lamuan ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Lamoan ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Zosi go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 34 bowan, 146 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 99% kyan ko 144 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 1% kyan ko 2 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 88%, Amis 1%, Paywan 1%, Coo 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 8%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Lamoan hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Lamoan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyaho' na Lamoan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Lamoan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Lamoan hya' ga Panital. tay mkyaho' na Lamoan hya' ga Talok. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Lamoan ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Lamoan ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
